author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Orkla starts share buyback program
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - Orkla ASA:
* HAS DECIDED TO INITIATE A SHARE BUYBACK PROGRAM FOR UP TO 10 MILLION SHARES IN THE MARKET
* THE PROGRAM WILL BE INITIATED TODAY AND TERMINATED ON 23 JUNE 2018 AT THE LATEST
* THE SHARES PURCHASED UNDER THIS PROGRAM WILL BE USED FOR ORKLAâ€™S SHARE FOR EMPLOYEES PROGRAM AS APPROVED BY THE GENERAL MEETING ON 12 APRIL 2018 AS WELL AS FOR AMORTIZATION PURPOSES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By Camilla Knudsen)
